title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Raymundo: PART 1
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Raymundo: PART 1
description:
The Best Bits podcast is now officially separated into two podcasts!! This part of the podcast is the version you all have been wanting as a stand-alone, Morgan and a guest having their in-depth conversations without any interruptions. In this podcast you’ll hear Morgan and Raymundo talk about their jams and things they’re watching right now. Plus some strange things that have happened to them both recently and of course, some Food Worlds!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
